name: Llangattock Hours
maker: Willem Vrelant, Master of the Llangattock Hours, Master of the Llangattock Epiphany, et al
description: Llangattock Hours; Willem Vrelant (Flemish, died 1481, active 1454 - 1481), Master of the Llangattock Hours (Flemish, active about 1450 - 1460), Master of the Llangattock Epiphany (Flemish, active about 1450 - 1460), et al; Ghent (bound), Belgium; 1450s; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with original brown calf; Leaf: 26.4 x 18.4 cm (10 3/8 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 7; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Llangattock Hours
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with original brown calf
